com.guidewire.pl.plugin.validation
Class GeneralValidationData

java.lang.Object
  com.guidewire.pl.plugin.validation.GeneralValidationData
All Implemented Interfaces:
GWRemotable
public class GeneralValidationData
extends java.lang.Object
implements GWRemotable

Stores validation data for a general validation exception related to the entity being validated. This include exceptions across multiple fields or exceptions not related to a particular field.

Note you can indicate failure as both an error and a warning simultaneously. However, if the failure is both an error and a warning, the failure should have different error and warning levels.
